plot outline: Vasudha and Sujata are sister-in-laws. Since Sujata can't bear a child, Vasudha asks her to adopt her son, Rohan. But their callous neighbor Bharti, plants insecurity in Sujata's mind, resulting in chaos and turmoil within the family, the same family who once lived in harmony, where an atmosphere of gaiety and joy reigned supreme. Both the families decide to part ways and amidst all this Rohan learns that Sujata has adopted him and he decides to leave the house.
title: Devki
plot: Vasudha and Sujata are sister-in-laws. Since Sujata can't bear a child, Vasudha asks her to adopt her son, Rohan. But their callous neighbor Bharti, plants insecurity in Sujata's mind, resulting in chaos and turmoil within the family, the same family who once lived in harmony, where an atmosphere of gaiety and joy reigned supreme. Both the families decide to part ways and amidst all this Rohan learns that Sujata has adopted him and he decides to leave the house.::Everest Entertainment

Paranjpe family lives with lot of love and care the head of the family Paranjpe has two sons Pranav and Prashant who live with their wives Vasudha and Sujata who are not less then sisters and have their kids Nikhil and Rohan.Few years back the families happiness was spoiled when Sujata lost her child in the womb and got the news that she cant bear child in future and lost her mental balance Vasudha then decided to bear a child and give to Sujata even thou her life was at risk. In present that happiness is again short lived when Nikhil elder son of Vasudha and Pranav passes away due to accident and doctors had already advised Vasudha not to bear a child again.Vasudha then becomes possessive about Rohan thus creating rift in the family.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
